remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  Combine ~ paddasslem16 and ~ paddasslem17 . (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddass.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddass.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddasslem18 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) ) -> ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) C_ ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) ) $.
